name: Gold Front
tagline: We are a creative studio in San Francisco.
description:
Gold Front is an award-winning creative studio in San Francisco. We help companies find their greatness and tell their storyâ€”through branding, advertising and hands-on content production.
Gold Front was founded by creative director Josh Lowman, after serving as a freelance creative at Wieden & Kennedy, Goodby, Silverstein & Partners, Venables Bell & Partners and 72andSunny.
